participant_1.background:
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.
I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.

participant_2.background:
I'm glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.
I am a thirty-something male who decided to quit my job and travel the world for a couple of months.
I remember writing short stories and making movies with my friends when I was a child.
i love the outdoors.
my son plays on the local football team.

content.text: What's the best decision you've ever made?
I'm thirty something and decided to quit my job and travel the world for a couple of months. It was amazing!
That sounds like a lot of fun! Are you glad you made that decision?
I am! It was really eye opening and I'm so glad I did it. What's your favorite movie?
That's great! My favorite movie is probably Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind. It's so sad but beautiful.
I haven't seen that one! I'll have to check it out. I love movies that make me feel something.
Me too! I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
That's really interesting. I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.
That's good! I'm trying to eat healthier and exercise more. It's hard, but I'm making progress.
It is hard, but it's worth it! I love the outdoors. Do you like to go hiking or camping?
I do! I love being in nature. I went camping last weekend and it was so much fun.
That sounds great! I'm glad you had a good time.
Me too! I'm looking forward to going camping again soon.
That's awesome! I hope you have a great time.
